div.p: The following extract shows how an IM conversation log could be marked up.
div.pre: <dialog> <dt> <time>14:22</time> egof <dd> I'm not that nerdy, I've only seen 30% of the star trek episodes <dt> <time>14:23</time> kaj <dd> if you know what percentage of the star trek episodes you have seen, you are inarguably nerdy <dt> <time>14:23</time> egof <dd> it's unarguably <dt> <time>14:24</time> kaj <dd> you are not helping your case </dialog>
